description:
***Sports Calendar 2.1.5 adds WebOS 2.x support for adding events to your calendar. It also adds Touchpad support running in emulation mode. A full screen Touchpad version will be released soon**

Sports Calendar provides a quick and easy way to discover the schedule of your favorite sports team. It also allows you to place that schedule to your WebOS device's calendar. 

We current support the following leagues and events: NFL, NHL, NCAA Basketball, NCAA Football, Women's NCAA Basketball, MLB, NBA, PGA, English Premier League, UFC, MLS, NASCAR, Formula 1, Indycar, NASCAR Truck, NASCAR Nationwide, Serie A, La Liga, German Bundesliga, Scottish Premier League, MotoGP, AMA motocross, AMA motocross and Bodybuilding

Additional Leagues & Teams will be added when schedules become available and by user request. The is a free version available that has limited functionality called "Sports Calender - Free Version"

***Sports Calendar 2.0 is a has tons of new features, including adding home/away schedules, single events. It now allows for multiple calendars, the interface has been redone and is faster! For full change log and new features please visit http://unnamedapps.com/sportscalendar.***
